/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the street, looking down its length towards the horizon. The street is lined with trees on both sides, creating a natural canopy overhead. A car is captured in motion on the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the trees and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky.
